Author: vivacriptorey
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: You are the one who wrote pure nonsense in the white paper. One of my arguments is that you have no github, no verifiable code. How is that "not grounded"? It's fact. No verifiable experience from any of the members. Not grounded either? It's just another fact. I have enough experience to spot plain money grab ICOs, like this one. You won't fool anyone with enough experience just by saying "Neural Networks" a few times. It's laughable, I have seen better built scams. I get it, you have to defend your money grab. But I can keep exposing your bullshit all day long.

Author: Daseron
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: Hello, thank you for your comment. It is very valuable to us. At the moment we are a local private enterprise working in our country. Our company works under the patent. We are engaged in the development of projects to order, so we do not have public pages of projects. All the projects we sell to the customer and in each contract indicates the non-disclosure of the project. You definitely noticed that we did not have links to social pages, but we fixed it. All social pages are real. Although at the moment we have some developments for this system, but they are not enough to release a demo project. The full development of the project will begin after ICO fees. Therefore, we found it unnecessary to insert into a white sheet. If you have any other questions, you can ask them in the topic or write a personal message to this account.

Author: Daseron
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: Your perception of our project is completely subjective. You do not accept the arguments that we give to you. The white sheet describes the real principles of work used in information security. This is where the concept of people centric security is applied. To store the data, we used a model used by banks working on the block. They are also based on the principle of the work of the blockade and neural networks. Your reaction only indicates that you do not have sufficient level of awareness in this area. Before starting a dispute, you should increase your knowledge.

Author: vivacriptorey
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: Nah, you are just using buzzwords, poorly trying to make your ICO look legit. I have seen it many MANY times. You just used the phrase Neural Network 4 times in your white paper, and you explain absolutely nothing. "model used by banks working on the block", complete nonsense. "The rights of a participation in auctions are defined by our neural network based on the set of rules, which are defined in the system." Nope, nothing. Jibber Jabber.

Author: Daseron
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: We do not try to use fashion words, but we really know what is behind them. Our team has experience in developing such systems. Before writing the project, we conducted an analysis of how the block was applied on the market. We looked in the direction of Alfa Bank, S7 Airlines, LightCyber and many other systems. We identified problems in the market and developed the best solution. And about the white sheet. The rules for calculating the right of participation can be set by the users themselves. That is, the user will enter the restrictions that he needs at the moment. In addition, we have provided standard conditions, such as age limits, violence rating, gender equality and so on. If you have any further questions do not hesitate to contact. After all, your interest in our system is pleasant to us.

Author: Daseron
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: The crowdsale is going to be run through Ethereum, you will recieve tokens immediately when Ether is sent to the crowdsale address. Escrow is needed if the tokens are distributed manually by the team after the crowdsale ends. In our case it is fully automated by smart contracts.

Author: Daseron
Title: [ANN] [ICO] DASERON Cybersecurity APP, ICO START! JOIN ALL!
Body: Our system built on the Ethereum code. We use a non-public crypto-exchange network. We create an internal lock to store information. As a result, it will not be possible to cancel the transaction. A similar example of using block technology technologies can be seen in banking systems. In addition, the blocking transaction can not be canceled or deleted. This increases the level of confidence in smart contracts deployed on Ethereum.  The market price of our token will grow from the increase in the capitalization of our application, which depends on the number of transactions made in our system and the data stored. The redemption of tokens will be conducted as a consequence with a price higher than the purchase price.  The crowdsale is going to be run through Ethereum, you will recieve tokens immediately when Ether is sent to the crowdsale address. Escrow is needed if the tokens are distributed manually by the team after the crowdsale ends. In our case it is fully automated by smart contracts.
